trans-unit.source: Represents the metrics used to lay out a character in a device font.
trans-unit.target: Representerer målene brukes til å sette opp et tegn på en enhetsskrift.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics> object is constructed using the default metric values.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics>objektet bygges bruker standardverdiene for metrikkverdi for tjenestenivåavtaler.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref> class by specifying the metrics as a string.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"> </xref> klassen ved å angi målene som en streng.

trans-unit.source: The `metrics` parameter is a comma-delimited string that specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics> properties in the following order: - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.Baseline%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A> The first two properties, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, are required.
trans-unit.target: Den `metrics` er en kommadelt streng som angir den <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics>egenskapene i denne rekkefølgen:- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.Baseline%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A>de første to egenskapene <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, kreves.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.Baseline%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics>

trans-unit.source: However, the other five properties are optional, and will default to zero if not specified.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid de fem egenskapene er valgfri, og vil som standard null hvis ikke angitt.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify the string value of "0.75,0.75,,0.1" for the `metrics` parameter, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> properties are set—the unspecified properties are set to zero.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis du angir strengverdien for "0.75,0.75,,0.1" for den `metrics` parameteren den <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>egenskapene er angitt, er ikke angitt egenskapene er satt til null.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: A comma-delimited <xref:System.String> value that represents the metrics for the character.
trans-unit.target: En kommadelt <xref:System.String>verdi som Representer målene for tegnet.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the baseline value for the character.
trans-unit.target: Henter den opprinnelige verdien for tegnet.

trans-unit.source: The return value represents the vertical offset from the bottom of the black box to the baseline.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som returneres representerer den loddrette forskyvningen fra bunnen av boksen svart i opprinnelige.

trans-unit.source: A positive value indicates the baseline is above the bottom of the black box, while a negative value indicates the baseline is below the bottom of the black box.
trans-unit.target: En positiv verdi angir opprinnelige er over nederst i boksen svart under en negativ verdi opprinnelige er under bunnen av svarte-boksen.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double> representing the baseline.
trans-unit.target: En verdi av typen <xref:System.Double>som representerer opprinnelige.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the black box for the character.
trans-unit.target: Henter høyden på svart for tegnet.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double> representing the black box height.
trans-unit.target: En verdi av typen <xref:System.Double>som representerer svarte boksen høyden.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the width of the black box for the character.
trans-unit.target: Henter bredden på den svarte boksen for tegnet.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double> representing the black box width.
trans-unit.target: En verdi av typen <xref:System.Double>representerer svarte boksbredde.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the recommended white space below the black box.
trans-unit.target: Henter det anbefalte mellomrommet under svarte-boksen.

trans-unit.source: A negative value indicates an overhang.
trans-unit.target: En negativ verdi angir en henging.

trans-unit.source: The vertical advance for the character is the sum of the property values <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, and BottomSideBearing.
trans-unit.target: Loddrett forskudd for tegnet er summen av egenskapsverdiene <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, og BottomSideBearing.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A>

trans-unit.source: The vertical advance cannot be less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Loddrett forskudd kan ikke være mindre enn null.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: En verdi av typen <xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref> object is equal to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"> </xref> objektet som er lik gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics> objects are equal if the following properties are equal: <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A>
trans-unit.target: To <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics>objekter er like Hvis er lik følgende egenskaper: <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A><xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A><xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A><xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A><xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A><xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref> object to compare to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"> </xref> objektet til å sammenligne gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the objects are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis objekter er like. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a hash code from the metric values of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en hash-kode fra metrikkverdi for tjenestenivåavtaler verdiene i den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: En verdi av typen <xref:System.Int32>.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets the recommended white space to the left of the black box.
trans-unit.target: Henter det anbefalte mellomrommet til venstre for den svarte boksen.

trans-unit.source: A negative value indicates an overhang.
trans-unit.target: En negativ verdi angir en henging.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal advance for the character is the sum of the property values LeftSideBearing, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Vannrett forskudd for tegnet er summen av egenskapsverdiene LeftSideBearing, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The horizontal advance cannot be less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Vannrett forskudd kan ikke være mindre enn null.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: En verdi av typen <xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a comma-delimited string representing metric values.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en kommadelt streng som representerer metrikkverdi for tjenestenivåavtaler verdier.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> value is a comma-delimited string that specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics> properties in the following order: - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.Baseline%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A> The first two properties, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, are required.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.String>verdien er en kommadelt streng som angir den <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics>egenskapene i denne rekkefølgen:- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.Baseline%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A>de første to egenskapene <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, kreves.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.Baseline%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: However, the other five properties are optional, and will default to zero if not specified.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid de fem egenskapene er valgfri, og vil som standard null hvis ikke angitt.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify the string value of "`0.75,0.75,,0.1`" for the `metrics` parameter, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> properties are set—the unspecified properties are set to zero.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis du angir strengverdien for "`0.75,0.75,,0.1`" for den `metrics` parameteren den <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>egenskapene er angitt, er ikke angitt egenskapene er satt til null.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: En verdi av typen <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the recommended white space to the right of the black box.
trans-unit.target: Henter det anbefalte mellomrommet til høyre for den svarte boksen.

trans-unit.source: A negative value indicates an overhang.
trans-unit.target: En negativ verdi angir en henging.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal advance for the character is the sum of the property values <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>, and RightSideBearing.
trans-unit.target: Vannrett forskudd for tegnet er summen av egenskapsverdiene <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>, og RightSideBearing.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>

trans-unit.source: The horizontal advance cannot be less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Vannrett forskudd kan ikke være mindre enn null.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: En verdi av typen <xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the recommended white space above the black box.
trans-unit.target: Henter anbefalte mellomrom over svarte-boksen.

trans-unit.source: Recommended white space above the black box.
trans-unit.target: Anbefalte mellomrom over svarte-boksen.

trans-unit.source: The vertical advance for the character is the sum of the property values TopSideBearing, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Loddrett forskudd for tegnet er summen av egenskapsverdiene TopSideBearing, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: The vertical advance cannot be less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Loddrett forskudd kan ikke være mindre enn null.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: En verdi av typen <xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>
